resources.string: Hey! Hello I am Deepak M S , student of first year BTech Computer Science and Engineering at School of Engineering CUSAT.\n I love coding . One of my hobbies are try to learn new things on coding. I am pretty well at C and Java Programming.and also a web developer.I am the owner of Noobcoders10 organisation on github.This organisation will help the beginners . We are trying to get all the resource for beginners in that repo. Really simple language . effective communication between the students. now only the first lesson of C is available . In future more course are coming.
